dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(createdAt)
| extend createdAt = todatetime(createdAt)
| extend logType = type
| extend createdBy_email = iff(isnull(createdBy), "", tostring(createdBy.email))
| extend createdBy_id = iff(isnull(createdBy), "", tostring(createdBy.id))
| extend createdBy_name = iff(isnull(createdBy), "", tostring(createdBy.name))
| extend createdBy_type = iff(isnull(createdBy), "", tostring(createdBy.type))
| extend object_id = iff(isnull(object), "", tostring(object.id))
| extend object_name = iff(isnull(object), "", tostring(object.name))
| extend context_ip = iff(isnull(context), "", tostring(context.ip))
| extend context_team_id = iff(isnull(context.team), "", tostring(context.team.id))
| extend context_team_name = iff(isnull(context.team), "", tostring(context.team.name))
| extend context_team_type = iff(isnull(context.team), "", tostring(context.team.type))
| extend context_organization_id = iff(isnull(context.organization), "", tostring(context.organization.id))
| extend context_organization_name = iff(isnull(context.organization), "", tostring(context.organization.name))
| extend context_organization_type = iff(isnull(context.organization), "", tostring(context.organization.type))
| project TimeGenerated, id, createdAt, event, category, logType, createdBy_email, createdBy_id, createdBy_name, createdBy_type, object_id, object_name, context_ip, context_team_id, context_team_name, context_team_type, context_organization_id, context_organization_name, context_organization_type, details
